attributes.action: To make it a criminal offence to leave any child under the age of  twelve years unsupervised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of recent events, I feel that parents put their children at risk from abduction or accident by leaving them unattended for any amount of time and that it should be a criminal offence to do so if the child is under the age of twelve years, and by so doing, parents leave themselves open to prosecution.
